item.title: 乐高将以 2.7 亿美元从默林手中收购娱乐中心
item.description: 丹麦玩具制造商乐高（Lego）周三表示，将以 2 亿英镑（2.695 亿美元）的价格从主题公园运营商默林娱乐公司（Merlin Entertainments）手中收购 29 家探索中心，以配合其加强控制消费者与其品牌互动的战略。【原文：Danish toymaker Lego said on Wednesday it will buy 29 discovery centres from theme park operator Merlin Entertainments in a 200 million pounds ($269.5 million) deal, in line with a strategy to strengthen control over consumer interactions with its brand.】

item.title: 英国 JD Sports 称耐克 "做了所有正确的事情 "来提升销售额
item.description: 耐克新任首席执行官埃利奥特-希尔（Elliott Hill）得到了其最大客户之一英国体育用品零售商 JD Sports 的信任票，JD Sports 的财务总监称耐克正在 "做所有正确的事情 "来重振需求。【原文：Nike's new CEO Elliott Hill got a vote of confidence from one of its largest customers, British sportswear retailer JD Sports , whose finance chief said Nike was "doing all the right things" to revive demand.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯任命新技术和生产主管
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周三宣布对高层管理人员进行调整，由生产主管约尔格-伯泽尔（Joerg Burzer）接替首席技术官马库斯-舍费尔（Markus Schaefer），以更年轻的董事会追求成本效益。【原文：Mercedes-Benz announced changes to its top management on Wednesday, replacing chief technology officer Markus Schaefer with head of production Joerg Burzer, as it pursues cost efficiencies with a younger board.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍德赛德公司与土耳其 BOTAS 签订液化天然气供应协议
item.description: 澳大利亚伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周三表示，该公司已达成协议，向土耳其国有石油公司 BOTAS 供应约 58 亿立方米液化天然气。【原文：Australia's Woodside Energy said on Wednesday it has clinched an agreement to supply about 5.8 billion cubic metres of liquefied natural gas, to Turkish state-owned petroleum company BOTAS.】

item.title: 礼来公司老板称英国是药品价格 "最差 "的欧洲国家
item.description: 礼来公司首席执行官戴夫-里克斯（Dave Ricks）在接受《金融时报》采访时说，英国 "可能是欧洲药价最差的国家"，这加大了政府要求改善制药商市场条件的压力。【原文：Eli Lilly Chief Executive Dave Ricks said Britain was "probably the worst country in Europe" for drug prices in an interview with the Financial Times, intensifying pressure on the government to improve market conditions for drugmakers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚的 "不确定性迷宫 "阻碍了价值 400 亿澳元的并购活动，为前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 今年，澳大利亚有价值近 400 亿澳元的大单收购交易失败，是 15 年来失败交易最多的一年，这是因为监管风险和估值失调加剧了在日益严格的监管环境中应对挑战的难度。【原文：Nearly $40 billion worth of big ticket buyouts have collapsed in Australia this year - the most in fifteen years - as regulatory risk and misaligned valuations add to the growing challenges in navigating an increasingly stringent regulatory environment.】

item.title: 独家报道信函显示法国将审查日产欧洲供应商的付款情况
item.description: 路透社查阅的信件显示，法国政府正在审查日产欧洲业务是否按时向供应商付款，并要求该汽车制造商提交 2024 年的大量财务记录。【原文：The French government is reviewing whether Nissan's European business paid suppliers on time, and it has asked the automaker to submit extensive financial records for 2024, correspondence reviewed by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 福特因转向柱缺陷召回逾11.55万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，由于存在可能导致转向柱上轴脱落的缺陷，福特汽车公司将在美国召回115539辆汽车。【原文：Ford Motor Co is recalling 115,539 vehicles in the U.S. due to a defect that could cause the steering column's upper shaft to detach, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Atos 将为欧盟提供网络安全服务
item.description: 巴黎上市公司阿托斯（Atos）周三表示，该公司将成为莱昂纳多（Leonardo）联合体的主要承包商，为欧盟提供网络安全服务。【原文：Atos will be the lead contractor in a consortium with Leonardo to provide cyber security services to the European Union, the Paris listed company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 调查显示，针对公司高管的暴力威胁呈上升趋势
item.description: 三分之二的美国大型科技公司安全主管表示，在过去两年中，针对公司高管的暴力威胁有所增加，许多公司现在为高级员工及其家属提供保护。【原文：Two thirds of U.S.-based security chiefs at large technology companies say the threat of violence towards their executives has increased in the past two years, with many now providing protection for senior staff and their families.】

item.title: 足立：日本央行将利率上调至 0.75% 可能不会对日本经济增长造成太大影响
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 独家报道：酒精游说团体与世卫组织就健康影响展开斗争
item.description: 路透社查阅的信件和电子邮件显示，比利时啤酒业、墨西哥龙舌兰酒生产商和喜力啤酒公司今年夏天都曾游说各国政府抵制联合国卫生机构推行针对酒精的更严格规定。【原文：The Belgian beer industry, Mexico's tequila makers and Heineken all lobbied governments this summer to resist a push by the U.N.'s health agency to introduce tougher rules targeting alcohol, letters and an email reviewed by Reuters show.】

item.title: 文件显示，中国商飞落后于 C919 飞机的交付目标
item.description: 根据三家航空公司提交的监管文件，中国商用飞机制造商中国商飞公司（COMAC）在生产窄体商用飞机C919方面正落后于之前制定的交付目标。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC is falling behind on previously stated delivery targets for the production of its narrow-body C919 commercial plane, according to regulatory filings from the three airlines that fly the model.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局因技术问题要求美联航航班停飞
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周三表示，以技术问题为由，已下令美联航航班在美国和加拿大机场停飞。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday it has issued a ground stop for United Airlines flights at U.S. and Canadian airports, citing a technological issue.】

item.title: 新西兰央行新任瑞典籍老板加入该行时受到政治动荡的冲击，他说 "kia ora
item.description: 新西兰现代史上首位外籍央行行长就任央行行长一职，正值外界对新西兰央行经济管理的批评声浪高涨，全球独立货币政策面临政治压力。【原文：New Zealand's first foreign central bank governor in modern history takes the top job amid heightened criticism of the bank's management of the economy and as independent monetary policy around the world comes under political pressure.】

item.title: 早间新闻：波涛汹涌的季节到了
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特（Gregor Stuart Hunter）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter:】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出 Qwen3-Max 人工智能模型，参数超过万亿个
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴周三发布了迄今为止最大的人工智能语言模型--Qwen3-Max，公司正在加速推进人工智能技术。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba announced on Wednesday its largest artificial intelligence language model to date, the Qwen3-Max, as the company accelerates a push into artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表与东南亚同行会晤，关税冲击迫在眉睫
item.description: 周三，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）和东南亚国家的贸易代表将在吉隆坡举行会议，讨论贸易和投资协议。【原文：Hefty U.S. tariffs imposed on Southeast Asian countries will loom over a meeting between U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer and his regional counterparts in Kuala Lumpur on Wednesday that is meant to discuss a trade and investment agreement.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行抨击 ASX 交易结算失败
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周三表示，澳大利亚证券交易所在去年交易结算失败后，必须对其治理、文化和风险管理进行 "基础性改革"。【原文：Australia's central bank said on Wednesday the Australian Securities Exchange must make "foundational changes" to its governance, culture and risk management after last year's trading settlement failure.】

item.title: 越南表示将继续与美国进行贸易谈判，争取达成其他自由贸易协定
item.description: 越南总理周三在一份声明中表示，越南将继续与美国进行贸易谈判，同时寻求与其他市场签署自由贸易协定，并补充说，越南今年的出口增长目标是 12%。【原文：Vietnam will continue trade negotiations with the United States while seeking to sign free trade deals with other markets, the prime minister said in a statement on Wednesday, adding that the country is targeting export growth of 12% this year.】

item.title: 我们对新西兰新任央行行长的了解
item.description: 新西兰周三任命安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）为该国新任央行行长，使她成为首位女性央行行长。她将于 12 月 1 日上任。【原文：New Zealand on Wednesday appointed Anna Breman as the country's new central bank governor, making her the first woman in the position. She takes up the role on December 1.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月份月度通胀率回升，但核心指标降温
item.description: 澳大利亚 8 月份消费者价格创下一年来最快的年增长率，但衡量核心通胀的一个关键指标有所放缓，这为进一步降息敞开了大门。【原文：Australian consumer prices rose in August at the fastest annual pace in a year, but a key measure of core inflation eased, keeping the door open to a further cut in interest rates.】

item.title: 新西兰任命瑞典央行行长 Anna Breman 为央行行长
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）周三宣布，任命安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）为新西兰新任央行行长，使她成为首位女性央行行长。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis on Wednesday announced that Anna Breman has been appointed as the country's new central bank governor, making her the first woman in the role.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在华尔街隔夜下跌后有所缓和
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）对未来利率走势的言论几乎没有给出任何暗示，隔夜华尔街股市下跌后，周三亚洲股市开盘下跌。【原文：Stocks began the day on the back foot on Wednesday in Asia after declines on Wall Street overnight following comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell that gave little indication about the future path of interest rates.】

item.title: 加拿大总理期待深化与中国的 "建设性 "贸易谈判
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，他与中国总理李强进行了 "建设性的 "贸易谈判，并期待对话随着时间的推移不断深化，因为两国都在寻求摆脱关税冲突的途径。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said he had "constructive" trade talks with Chinese Premier Li Qiang and expected the dialogue to deepen over time, as both countries seek to navigate a way out of a tariff conflict.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Optus 公司任命 Kerry Schott 负责对 Triple Zero 故障进行独立审查
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大电信运营商 Optus 周三表示，已任命 Kerry Schott 负责对上周发生的技术故障进行独立审查。澳大利亚第二大电信运营商 Optus 周三表示，已任命 Kerry Schott 领导对上周发生的技术故障进行独立审查，该故障导致 Triple Zero 紧急呼叫中断，并与四人死亡有关。【原文：Optus, Australia's no. 2 telecom carrier, said on Wednesday it appointed Kerry Schott to lead an independent review into last week's technical failure that disrupted Triple Zero emergency calls and has been linked to four deaths.】

item.title: 美国原油库存下降加剧供应紧张感，石油上涨
item.description: 周三，油价连续第二天上涨，因为一份行业报告显示上周美国原油库存下降，这增加了市场对供应趋紧的感觉。【原文：Oil prices rose for a second day on Wednesday as an industry report showed U.S. crude inventories declined last week, adding to a sense in the market of tightening supplies.】

item.title: 卡尼表示加美贸易谈判将进入 USMCA 审查程序
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周二表示，与美国的贸易谈判正在进行中，许多遗留问题将转入即将举行的美国-墨西哥-加拿大贸易协定（USMCA）审查。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said on Tuesday that trade negotiations with the U.S. were ongoing, and a lot of the remaining issues would move to a forthcoming review of the United States-Mexico-Canada trade agreement (USMCA).】

item.title: Meta's Llama 将提供给美国在欧洲和亚洲的盟友
item.description: 美国 Meta Platforms 公司周二表示，美国在欧洲和亚洲的盟友现在可以使用该公司的人工智能系统 Llama。【原文：Allies of the United States in Europe and Asia will now have access to Meta Platforms' artificial intelligence system Llama, the company said on Tuesday, a day after the U.S. approved its use for government agencies.】

item.title: 南非总统称贸易被用作 "武器
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）周二表示，南非正在与美国贸易代表进行谈判，以降低美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的关税，此前他曾对世界各国领导人表示，"贸易现在正被用作一种武器"。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa said on Tuesday his country is in talks with a U.S. trade representative to reduce tariffs levied by U.S. President Donald Trump after telling world leaders that "trade is now being used as a weapon."】
